title: Opening Keynote: The Future of Health Data in Africa

abstract: An overview of the challenges and opportunities in health data governance across the continent.

title: REDCap for Clinical Trials: Best Practices

abstract: A deep dive into setting up and managing clinical trials using REDCap.

title: Interoperability Standards: FHIR and REDCap

title: Infrastructure Scaling for Large Cohorts
